intro: Hopea shingkeng, commonly known as the Shingkeng ironwood, is a tropical tree native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its dense, hard wood that is highly valued for its durability and strength. The plant belongs to the Dipterocarpaceae family, which includes many valuable timber species. It typically grows in lowland evergreen forests and can reach heights of up to 30 meters. Its leaves are elliptical,革质 (leathery), and arranged alternately along the stem.
